message: Let's start fair. I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. I'll take the bigger share, but I'm leaving you with something.
Your offer was a bit harsh, Alice. Let's be reasonable.  I'll take a larger share this time, but you'll still get a decent amount.
Okay, let's try an even split this time. I'm willing to compromise, but we both need to be realistic about the shrinking value of the money.
